title: Perplexity Campus Strategist Program 2024
meta_description: Lead growth and marketing on campus. Meet and learn from the Perplexity leadership team. Join other ambitious students passionate about AI and technology in shaping the future of knowledge.
main_content: Back ABOUT ME He/Him Chandra Suda Stanford University LinkedIn Chandra Suda is a freshman at Stanford University studying computer science and math. He is passionate about Generative AI startups and research. © 2024 PERPLEXITY AI, Inc. All rights reserved.
